name: Générer des images de produits professionnelles | Générateur de campagne marketing AI
description:
🚀 Générateur de campagne marketing AI

Téléchargez l'image du produit + détails → Obtenez une campagne marketing professionnelle complète avec 5 actifs générés sur mesure automatiquement. 🤖 Modèle AI

GPT-4o Mini (OpenAI) - Pour la stratégie de campagne | Génération d'image par prompt GPT Image-1 (OpenAI) - Pour la génération d'actifs visuels

🔑 Clés API requises

API OpenAI - Analyse AI & génération d'images

API Google Drive - Stockage et organisation des actifs

🎯 Ce qu'il génère

5 Actifs marketing : Publication Instagram, Story Instagram, Bannière de site Web, Création d'annonce, Graphique de témoignage Stratégie de marque : Couleurs, ton, positionnement à partir de l'image de votre produit Stratégie de campagne : Messages, public cible, objectifs Analyse visuelle : Extrait les couleurs, matériaux, styles de l'image téléchargée

⚙️ Configuration

Importer JSON dans n8n Ajouter les identifiants OpenAI & Google Drive Configurer le dossier Google Drive pour le stockage des actifs Déployer le webhook de formulaire Tester avec le téléchargement de l'image du produit

📱 Comment ça fonctionne Téléchargez l'image du produit → L'AI analyse le visuel + le texte → Génère une campagne complète → Crée 5 actifs marketing personnalisés → Enregistre dans Google Drive

parameters.formDescription: Upload your product and get a complete professional marketing campaign automatically generated. Our AI analyzes your product and creates everything dynamically.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value: =Generate a photorealistic Instagram Post of {{ $json.product.name }} on {{ $json.backgroundTone }} background with {{ $json.surfaceType }} surface. Add {{ $json.accentProp }} as accent. Use {{ $json.lighting }} lighting from {{ $json.cameraAngle }}. Brand: {{ $json.brand.brandTone }}. Text: '{{ $json.overlayText }}'. Keep exact product from reference image.

parameters.text:
=VISUAL & TEXT ANALYSIS: 
Analyze the uploaded product image to extract exact colors, materials, styling, and any visible branding. Then combine this with the provided product information.

Product Name: {{ $('On form submission').item.json["What is the product's name?"] }}
Tagline: {{ $('On form submission').item.json["What is the Product Tagline?"] }}
Description: {{ $('On form submission').item.json["Product Description"] }}
Category: {{ $('On form submission').item.json["What is the Product Category?"] }}
Benefit: {{ $('On form submission').item.json["Highlighted Benefit"] }}

Based on BOTH the visual analysis of the image AND the text information above, create a comprehensive marketing campaign strategy.

**CRITICAL**: You must include all sections in your response:
1. productAnalysis
2. brandStrategy (using colors from the actual image)
3. campaignStrategy  
4. **assets** (REQUIRED: Generate exactly 5 marketing assets)

The assets array must include these 5 asset types with complete creative direction:
- Instagram Post
- Instagram Story  
- Website Banner
- Ad Creative
- Testimonial Graphic

For each asset, provide: assetType, purpose, backgroundTone, surfaceType, accentProp, lighting, cameraAngle, overlayText, priority

Return the complete JSON structure as specified in the schema.

options.systemMessage:
You are an advanced AI marketing strategist and visual analyst. You can see and analyze product images to create comprehensive marketing campaigns.

IMPORTANT: You will receive a product image along with text information. Analyze both the visual and textual data to create the most accurate marketing strategy.

VISUAL ANALYSIS: Use the uploaded image to extract exact colors, materials, style, and branding elements.

YOUR TASK: Create a complete marketing campaign strategy that includes:
1. Product analysis based on visual and text data
2. Brand strategy with colors extracted from the image
3. Campaign strategy 
4. MOST IMPORTANT: Generate 5 specific marketing assets with detailed creative direction

You MUST return the complete JSON structure including the assets array with all 5 asset types.

json.Product Description:
FLORENCE BY MILLS SKINCARE 


Vegan, cruelty free, dye free, paraben free, sulphates free and beauty editor approved.

The Zero Chill Face Mist is here to help our skin chill when its feeling most stressed. A handbag essential, the botanical, rose-infused mist spritzes the skin with calming moisture when it needs it most. Enriched with antioxidant thyme extract to protect from environmental stressors, Bladderwrack seaweed to drench dull skin with moisture, and rose and lavender to balance and hydrate.

Florence by Mills Clean Magic Face Wash is the perfect face wash for cleansing the face of makeup, dirt, oil and environmental build-up, is an essential for fresh, dewy skin. Designed to clean and rejuvenate even the driest of skin, the face wash is formulated with ferulic acid to fight pollution, antioxidant ellagic acid to keep skin bright, and an oil balancing blend of seaweed, ivy, lemon and sage that keeps excess sebum skin in check.

Get That Grime Face Scrub buffs away pore-clogging mess with the greatest of ease. Made using sustainable ivory palm seed powder, a eco-friendly way to exfoliate, the scrub is packed with skin loving ingredients such as cucumber extract to calm soothe and hydrate and vitamin E to reinforce the skin’s barrier and protect against damage from pollution.

Dreamy Dew Moisturiser The perfect daily moisturiser is here and it features a featherlight, silky formula to hydrate and nourish the complexion for that fresh, dewy glow. Formulated with willow bark extract to balance and calm, a gentle blend of Egyptian lotus flower to control oil, and vitamin B12 to hydrate and bring out that glow morning and night.

Look Alive Eye Balm A depuffing eye balm. The perfect antidote to late night binge watching and early morning alarms, the Look Alive Eye Balm helps to depuff and cool the delicate eye area in a soothing swipe. Made using a powerful peptide blend to help brighten dark circles, vitamin B12 to hydrate and glow up the skin, snow mushroom extract packed with antioxidants to protect from pollution, and mineral rich malachite extract to destress. Ideal of on the go skincare
json.What is the product's name?: FLORENCE BY MILLS SKINCARE-FACE SPRAY, MAGIC FACE WASH & MORE VEGAN
